#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
    int i,j,k=0,c,b,f;
    string a;
    while(1)
    {
        f=1;
        getline(cin,a);
        if(a[0]=='/'&&a[1]=='/') break;
        j=a.length();
        for(c=0;c<j;c++)
        {
            if(a[c]=='i'&&a[c+1]=='f')
            {
                //cout<<"1"<<endl;
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            if(a[c]=='w'&&a[c+1]=='h'&&a[c+2]=='i'&&a[c+3]=='l'&&a[c+4]=='e')
            {
                 //cout<<"2"<<endl;
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            if(a[c]=='f'&&a[c+1]=='o'&&a[c+2]=='r')
            {
                 //cout<<"3"<<endl;
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            if(a[c]=='e'&&a[c+1]=='l'&&a[c+2]=='s'&&a[c+3]=='e')
            {
                 //cout<<"4"<<endl;
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            if(a[c]=='{')
                {
                     //cout<<"5"<<endl;
                    f=0;
                    break;
                }
            if(a[c]=='}')
            {
                 //cout<<"6"<<endl;
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            if(a[0]=='#')
            {
                 //cout<<"7"<<endl;
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            if(a[c]=='('&&a[c+1]==')')
            {
                 //cout<<"8"<<endl;
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            if(a[c]==';')
            {
                //cout<<"9"<<endl;
                f=0;
                break;
            }
            if(a[c]=='('&&a[c+1]!='"')
            {
                f=0;
                break;
            }
        }
        if(f==1) k++;
    }
    printf("%d",k);
    return 0;
}
